attributes.action: Award Captain Peter Burkhill a medal for the professionalism shown in landing a 777 at heathrow without catastrophe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On Thursday 17th January 2008 at Heathrow Airport, the pilots on BA038 from Beijing had a complete powerdown on the aircraft, a matter of seconds from touchdown on the runway.

This petition is to get Captain Peter Burkhill and the rest of the crew onboard Medals to show our pride and relief for the crew successfully landing the aircraft with only a few minor injuries caused.
